name: Typing Text
author: WPDeveloper

sections.description:
Want to make your website more interactive? Using this Typing Text plugin for block editor, you can create eye-catching animated typing text in WordPress website.

Easily use this typing text effects inside blog posts or pages & impress your visitors.

⚙️ Completely Customizable: You can customize the content, speed, colors, etc to make it suitable for your website design

⚡ Super Light-weight: No extra resources used and it’s highly optimized for super fast loading & instant Live editing

🧑‍💻 Dedicated Support: We’ve an extraordinary support team ready to help you. Ask your questions in the support forum, we’ll get back to you immediately

🚀 BACKED BY A TRUSTED TEAM

This Block is brought to you by WPDeveloper, the team behind the most popular elements library Essential Addons for Elementor (used by almost 1 million+ happy users from 180+ countries).

👨‍💻 DOCUMENTATION AND SUPPORT

  • For documentation and tutorials go to our documentation
  • To report issue and contribution visit Github.
  • If you have any more questions, visit our support on the Plugin’s Forum.
  • For more information about features, FAQs and documentation, check out our website at WPDeveloper.

sections.installation:
Modern Way:

  1. Go to the WordPress Block/Gutenberg Editor
  2. Search For “Typing Text”.
  3. Install in 1-click

Old Way:

  1. Upload typing-text to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Follow the Documentation
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.

  • Fixed: compatibility support with wordpress 6.5 version

  • Improved: Font loader and Controls

1.2.3 – 23/08/2022

  • Added: Converted style-handler to php for working perfectly with Reusable blocks and FSE
  • Improved: Removed unused dependency

1.2.2 – 06/06/2022

  • Added: Animation, Custom Css and Responsive options
  • Improved: Controls & structure

  • Improved: Controls and structure
  • Added: Added WP 5.9 Version
  • Added: Advanced Tab In Inspector Panel

  • Improved: Inspector Panel Design & controls
  • Improved: Responsive Device Preview improved. Now the preview options synced with the wordpress’s default preview button.

  • Hotfix: minor compatibility issue

1.1.0 – 19/05/2021

  • Added: Dynamic asset generation for inline styles
  • Added: Responsive control

  • Fixed missing js file

1.0.0

  • Initial Release
sections.reviews:
Feature overkill

By audunmb on June 16, 2022

In addition to the promised effects this plugin loads fonts from Google fonts and adds lot's of custom style options. Why not let the theme and wordpress handle fonts and styling, and let the plugin do only what it should do? So, that’s a no for me. If you need custom fonts for your animated text only and don’t mind loading Google Fonts, this might be for you. If you want to maintain consistency for those using the site, find another solution.

To bad it's not working with the classic editor

By HenkKuiper on September 15, 2021

The plugin is OK but its to bad that this plugin does not work with the classic editor or Page builder of SiteOrigin.

functional but need polishing

By insomniasky on June 19, 2021

Nice WP "native" alternative to other typing effect plugins, but the current version still needs polishing, for example the cursor size and font/icon are fixed i.e. they do not change with text font style, which makes the plugin less useful in many scenarios.
